body_html: It looks like your version of pip is not installing things into the path that your version of python is expecting. Perhaps you have two versions of Python installed? What output do you get from which pip and which python? (These paths might give a clue....)
body_text: It looks like your version of pip is not installing things into the path that your version of python is expecting. Perhaps you have two versions of Python installed? What output do you get from which pip and which python? (These paths might give a clue....)
body: It looks like your version of `pip` is not installing things into the path that your version of `python` is expecting. Perhaps you have two versions of Python installed? What output do you get from `which pip` and `which python`? (These paths might give a clue....)
